info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 9 at 10:57AM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
Sabine River Near Gladewater affecting Gregg, Smith and Upshur Counties.
Sabine River Near Hawkins affecting Wood, Smith and Upshur Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas...
Sabine River Near Mineola affecting Wood and Smith Counties.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas...
Sabine River At Logansport affecting De Soto, Shelby and Panola Counties.
For the Sabine River...including Mineola, Hawkins, Gladewater, Longview, Beckville, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Sabine River near Gladewater.
* WHEN...From this evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Expect lowland flooding to continue with oil field operations curtailed.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 24.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 25.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening and continue rising to 30.5 feet Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.4 feet on 06/14/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at noon CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE

area.areaDesc: Gregg, TX; Smith, TX; Upshur, TX
